commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Let's toast to the super, huge, massive success of the School Idol Festival!

commands.speaker: Everyone
commands.line: Cheers!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I'm really glad we got through everything without any big mishaps.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: We have all of the volunteers to thank for that. Everyone worked so earnestly.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: I think you also deserve credit for that, since your preparations and instructions were so precise.

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: Ayumu's right. I think that speech you gave to all of the volunteers before the event really shifted everyone into gear.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Yep!

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: Everyone gathered here loves school idols. Let's all work together to create the best experience through our shared love. And let's make everyone's dreams come true!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Those words really struck a chord within me.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Yeah! I got emotional as well. It made me realize that you really did have a lot of passion for the School Idol Festival, Shioko.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: P-Please stop. I thought I went a bit too far on the passion scale myself with that speech.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: You shouldn't be embarrassed like that over being passionate! Your words motivated us as well.

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: They sure did. Thank you so much, Shioriko.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: I-I should be thanking you. Th-Thank you very much...for welcoming me in.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Not at all! I'm looking forward to having you on board!

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: *Giggle* That sure was a lot of fun, huh?

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: I wanna do it again. Rina-chan Board says, "Sparkle."

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Definitely! And I'd love to hold a bigger and better event here than the one we just pulled off!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: *Laugh* Everyone feels the same way. But I won't be able to join in on the club activities for a while...

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: You're gonna give it all you've got over there, so we'll make sure we practice our hearts out, too... *Sob*

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Oh no! Ayumu! Don't cry! I-I'm sorry! I shouldn't have brought that up while we were all having fun here. Forget what I just said! Let's enjoy ourselves!

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: No, we can't just act like it's nothing. There are only a few days left before you're due to fly off, right?

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: I didn't even know that music course students did short-term study abroad!

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: I can't believe you're going away for two whole months... That's so long.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: And I wanted to talk to you about my next performance!

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: I also wanted your advice since there's so much stuff I want to do!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I'm sorry I won't be around when you're just starting to pick up steam.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: You don't have to apologize! It's a yearly event for music course students, right?

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Yeah. And you're probably finding it tough as well... Right?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Of course I am!

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: Now that the Prez says she's having a hard time too, we need to make sure we send her off with a smile, Ayumu.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Y-Yeah. I know. We'll all be waiting for you, so have a safe trip!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Thanks, Ayumu.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I'll learn a bunch of stuff while I'm abroad so I can help you guys with your future endeavors!

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Okay, we're looking forward to it!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: I'm gonna practice real hard while you're away!

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: I'll improve so much you'll be knocked off your feet when you get back!

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: I like what you're preaching, Shizuku!

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Hey, guys! Since the Prez is gonna learn and grow while she's abroad, we need to follow Shizuku's lead and do the same thing!

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: Yeah, that's exactly right.

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Hrrrm. I'll skip my afternoon nap to focus on both my studies and practice.

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: I'll wake you up if you look like you're about to doze off.

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Geeently, though, okay?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: *Laugh* I feel like all of the worries I had just melted away. I'll focus on studying while I'm overseas as well!

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Yeah, I think that's a good plan. We'll give it everything we've got back here.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Right, Shioriko?

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: Yes. I will also devote myself to learning the ways of school idols while you're away.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Now that we're all moving in the same direction, shall we have another toast?

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: It IS the Prez's send-off party!

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Okay, everyone! Grab your cups!

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: A toast to wish the Prez success on her study abroad trip!

commands.speaker: Everyone
commands.line: To the Prez!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Hellooo? Ayumu? Are you awake?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Did I wake you up?

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: No, I was already awake.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Look, Ayumu...

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: I'm sorry about today!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: What?

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: I know everyone in the music course has to go overseas to study for a few months.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: I know that... But I've never been apart from you for two whole months before, so I couldn't keep my emotions in check.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: But let me say this to you.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Give it all you've got over the next two months. I'm sure you'll be okay no matter what happens, as long as you stay true to yourself.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: I'll also do my very best while you're away. I promise to grow so much that by the time you get back you'll be super surprised!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I was supposed to be the one offering you encouragement, but I ended up on the receiving end of it. Okay, I'll give it my all!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Safe travels!
